
Pywizard
**************************************

Pywizard is a pythonic way for configuration management.
Pywizard use python language itself as a dsl language, not restricting you
to use any programming technique existing in python language.
Pywizard is multilayered and may be used as a library and as a ready
use tool for configuration management as well.

   :maxdepth: 2

   cli
   api
   alternatives_api
